page.title: 06A Day In The Life Of Helen
page.content: My name is Helen I am 10 years old.on a typical school day I usually awake at 7.30am and lay in bed for a few minutes feeling tired then I push my quilt back reluctantly. After a breakfast of weetabix and toast I go upstairs to brush my teeth,comb my hair then have to rush around because it is twenty to nine. I collect my coat and bag then leave for school. At school I meet my friends and wait for the bell to go. The Bell goes at nine o' clock and we go into school for registration. We usually have an enlish lesson first. Then at ten thirty we have a break. After break we have hymn practice. Hymn practice is where we practice songs.Then we go back for a maths lesson. Continued on page 7.
